author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

A new test wf 136.8861 (EGamma Run2018D) is proposed, expanding 136.886 with instructions to force a lumi boundary crossing within a short (100 events) run, and enabling ```nConcurrentlumis``` as discussed in #26348 . This test is supposed to serve developments like those developed by the Core FWK team in #26592.

#### PR validation:

The wf 136.8861 runs till the end.
title: Add a data based relval test wf with lumi boundary crossing
